title: EP PanelDef
description: The MDENet education platform panel definition

id.description: A unique string used for identification.

name.description: The text used for the panels title.

icon.description: Reference to the name of the icon to use.

language.description: Reference to a set of language highlighting rule. https://github.com/mdenet/educationplatform/wiki/Adding-a-Tool#highlighting-rules

buttons.description: For tools that create editor instances e.g. language workbenches, reference to the id of a panel of editorActivity that is the editor instance.
